column4: Full name of the student: Last Name, First Name (example: Smith, Jane). Use the name that the GSD Administrator has on file.
Indicate the recommendation(s) from the faculty for this project.
Describe the type of building or site, based on function / purpose. Example: Military base.
Use tags to describe the project. Write one keyword per field. To add more tags, click on the plus sign on the right.
